txt.en:
'Nardur-stazg is the chief encampment of the Orcs of Moria in the northern reaches of Fanuidhol. It is a dangerous task, but I must ask you to enter Nardur-stazg and defeat any enemies you find there.

'This encampment is a danger to all who dwell upon the eastern side of the Misty Mountains. The threat must be put to rest.

'Nardur-stazg lies far to the north-west of here. When you have defeated the enemy there, return to me.'
'Well done, [placeholder]! Laying low the enemy at Nardur-stazg is quite an accomplishment!\n\n'Accept this reward as a token of my gratitude.'
'Nardur-stazg is the chief encampment of the Orcs in Fanuidhol. The threat of it must be removed, else the Orcs will only grow stronger.'
The Orcs of Moria have begun mustering in Fanuidhol in preparation to assault Lothl√≥rien.
Nardur-stazg lies to the north-west from Talan Gwilith.\n\nBelegoth has asked you to attack Nardur-stazg and defeat any enemies you find there.
Talk to Belegoth at Talan Gwilith
Belegoth is at Talan Gwilith, south-east of Nardur-stazg.\n\nYou should return to Belegoth with the tidings of your victory at Nardur-stazg.
